page.title: 15The Parish Priest
page.content: The Rev.Howard lives in Addlethorpe all alone except for a cat.At one time he was a missionary in South Africa and then he was a Chaplain at a Borstal Prison for young offenders. Seven months ago he became vicar of Ingoldmells.He wakes up at 4 a.m., makes a cup of coffee,potters about and reads.He gets up at 7 a.m.,has another cup of coffee and goes to church at 8.45 a.m..Sometimes he sorts out a problem and is late for morning service.At 10 a.m. on Mondays he comes to school and stays for one and half hours and then visits someone before he goes home at 1 p.m.. First he checks the telephone answering machine has lunch and continues visiting and helping people with their problems. At 6 p.m. he takes Evensong,often alone. He talks to everyone.
